en.Title: Revolutionizing Training Data Generation for LLMs
en.Intro: is a framework for synthetic data generation guided by knowledge graphs, designed to tackle challenges for knowledge-intensive QA generation.
en.Base URL Info: Base URL for the API, use SiliconFlow as default

zh.Title: 革新LLM训练数据生成
zh.Intro: 是一个基于知识图谱的合成数据生成框架，旨在解决知识密集型问答生成的挑战。
zh.Base URL Info: 调用模型API的URL，默认使用硅基流动
